title: If you aren't going to bring you A game to ranked GO PLAY NORMALS

replies.body:
While I agree that people who don't want to WIN should probably not play ranked, it is possible to get the message across without being a douche. 

It is , after all, just a game, and Riot should not ban people at all for recognizing it as such.
LOL, i play ranked for fun and fun only and guess what? 60% win rate. BOOM :P dont tell me not to have fun in ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=NiamhNyx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V0RRFJ6H,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-13T03:56:40.697+0000)
>
> LOL, i play ranked for fun and fun only and guess what? 60% win rate. BOOM :P dont tell me not to have fun in ranked.

Why are you even posting this - you play 3 ranked champs - main support - and have been playing since Season3 which means you probably have pretty good game knowledge.

Clearly reading comprehension is not one of your skills.

I never said you can't have fun. What I mean is when people say that its jut a game as an excuse for their terrible performance that cost you the match.

They are basically deciding the value of ranked for you. Trying to tell you how you should perceive the time you just spent for a loss.
If youre not bringing your A game, dont play league of join the bots.  No one wants to carry a loser in any game on league.
No, there has to be a place to mess around and experiment in the same setting as ranked, so I disagree with you.

You experiment and learn your champion in bots, you actually practice them in matchups in normals

That doesnt mean you try graves die to zed 11 times then go afk/rage quit.

Bots are a joke.  You could win against them with ad Soraka.

Unless you literally are incapable of playing the champion, it's fine to play them in normals.

Actually its recommended for someone to play against a team of intermediate bots which depending on the AI are not a joke. They are hard to lose against but they all take ignite and like bronze elo, they go all out on you. So when you try to 1 v5 intermediate bots be prepared to deal with 5 ults and ignites at once. People who can literally 1 v 5 intermediate bots dont have alot of trouble doing well in mid tier elo.
